mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, info_id, node_id, deal_user_id, monitor_user_id, result_status, fault_info from sys_order_log where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_order_log( id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, info_id, node_id, deal_user_id, monitor_user_id, result_status, fault_info) values (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser}, #{infoId}, #{nodeId}, #{dealUserId}, #{monitorUserId}, #{resultStatus}, #{faultInfo})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_order_log where delete_flag = 0
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
